author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 12361. Support CGI scripts in unpacked WARs.
Scripts are extracted to the context work directory before execution.
- Remove unused imports - thanks to Eclipse.

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 11875. A (very) minor optimisation but it closes a bug report.

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug11682. Deploying a webapp to the root context via an Ant
task when unpackWARs is true now behaves correctly.
- Remove unused imports - thanks to Eclipse.

author: larryi
msg: Port some changes to tester from Tomcat 5. These changes currently leave
1. The access to "/examples/.." fails the first time tester is run since starting
Tomcat by returning 200.  Subsequent runs of tester return the expected
2. For the JspDoc1.jsp test, Jasper condenses "" to within
<jsp:text> tags, instead of preserving whitespace.  Don't know how easy
it would be to port changes from Jasper HEAD.  This commit includes
updating the JspDoc1.txt golden file to that found in the Tomcat 5 tester.
I believe this should be the expected result for JSP 1.2 too.
